title: The Emerald Heart
description: Jim encounters Humphrey, a dwarf who has escaped from the evil Dr. Arcane.

title: The Living Image
description: Arcane makes a woman look like Holland's wife. He makes sure Holland a.k.a. Swamp Thing sees her. He approaches her and she runs away. He later tests her. She then asks him for his notes hoping it could help him. But Arcane is after one of his formulas. At the same time Holland recalls his last moments with his wife and moment when he became Swamp Thing because of Arcane.

title: The Death of Dr. Arcane
description: After a mutant kills Dr. Arcane, Swamp Thing must revive him to find out where Jim is hidden.

title: The Legend of the Swamp Maiden
description: The Swamp Maiden seduces Oboe before turning him into a monster.

title: Spirit of the Swamp
description: Swamp Thing turns the tables on Dr. Arcane's voodoo.

title: Blood Wind
description: Tressa inhales a potion that makes everyone lust after her.

title: Grotesquery
description: Swamp thing is abducted by a carnival freak show.

title: Natural Enemy
description: Jim is dying from a mutant fly bite he received while in a part of the forbidden swamp.

title: Treasure
description: A sickly stranger claiming to be Tressa's long-lost brother appears at the Langford house.

title: New Acquaintance
description: When an attempt on Dr. Alec Holland's life leaves him consumed by deadly chemicals and fire, the swamps of Louisiana transform him into a superhuman creature hell-bent on ridding the swamp--and the world--of the evil that men do.

title: Falco
description: Swamp Thing encounters Falco, who has come to kill Dr. Arcane for turning him from a bird into a man.

title: From Beyond the Grave
description: Dr. Arcane resorts to an evil plan to get his hands on Savannah's estate.

title: The Shipment
description: Jim disappears after spying on Dr. Arcane's mutant laboratory.

title: Birth Marks
description: Tressa and Will befriend Abigail and an infant, the only survivors of a ship blown up by Arcane.

title: Dark Side of the Mirror
description: Dr. Arcane creates a mutant Swamp Thing to murder a prying district attorney.

title: Silent Screams
description: When an attempt on Dr. Alec Holland's life leaves him consumed by deadly chemicals and fire, the swamps of Louisiana transform him into a superhuman creature hell-bent on ridding the swamp--and the world--of the evil that men do.

title: Walk a Mile in My Shorts
description: When an attempt on Dr. Alec Holland's life leaves him consumed by deadly chemicals and fire, the swamps of Louisiana transform him into a superhuman creature hell-bent on ridding the swamp--and the world--of the evil that men do.

title: The Watchers
description: When an attempt on Dr. Alec Holland's life leaves him consumed by deadly chemicals and fire, the swamps of Louisiana transform him into a superhuman creature hell-bent on ridding the swamp--and the world--of the evil that men do.

title: The Hunt
description: Will's father, an adventurer by trade, arrives in town to search for a rare flower.

title: Touch of Death
description: When an attempt on Dr. Alec Holland's life leaves him consumed by deadly chemicals and fire, the swamps of Louisiana transform him into a superhuman creature hell-bent on ridding the swamp--and the world--of the evil that men do.

title: Tremors of the Heart
description: When an attempt on Dr. Alec Holland's life leaves him consumed by deadly chemicals and fire, the swamps of Louisiana transform him into a superhuman creature hell-bent on ridding the swamp--and the world--of the evil that men do.

title: The Prometheus Parabola
description: When an attempt on Dr. Alec Holland's life leaves him consumed by deadly chemicals and fire, the swamps of Louisiana transform him into a superhuman creature hell-bent on ridding the swamp--and the world--of the evil that men do.

title: Night of the Dying
description: A vengeful voodoo priestess ensnares Arcane in a voodoo curse as revenge for his enslavement of Jim Kipp, who had once saved a cousin of hers from drowning. Alec helps Graham and a kindly voodoo priest save Arcane from certain death.

title: Love Lost
description: A self-proclaimed psychic comes to the swamp in search of Alec Holland with a message from his dead wife Linda. She also reveals that Jim is still alive and will be heard from soon.

title: Mist Demeanor
description: Killer mist from the swamp attacks Houma, putting residents in grave danger. Arcane and Alec team up to to find an antidote, while Abigail and Will hunt for a boy who may be lost in the mist. Can they stop the it before someone gets hurt?

title: A Nightmare on Jackson Street
description: Will's past comes back to haunt him not only in his dreams but here in his new home when a friend shows up who was involved in a robbey.

title: Better Angels
description: A scientist from Alec Holland's past is employed by a businessman who claims he wants to build a recycling plant near the swamp.

title: Children of the Fool
description: Will starts dating a girl from a carnival. Her boss who is manipulating the young carnies wants to sacrifice Will to "the forces of darkness" in a scam to keep his young work force in line.

title: A Jury of His Fears
description: After an eletrical explosion in his lab apparently kills Arcane, our arch fiend finds himself on trial in a nightmarish comedy of his crimes against his victims.

title: Poisonous
description: How will Swamp Thing deal with a man who has captured footage of him on film and the dealy creatures released into the swamp?

title: Smoke and Mirrors
description: A rock singer tries to run away from the consequences of the morbid overtones in the lyrics of his songs after two fans committ suicide to the suggestions therein.

title: This Old House of Mayan
description: Can Will escape the wrath of guardians to a lost Mayan temple within the swamp when he is forced to be an unwilling guide?

title: Sonata
description: Ann Fisk decides to confront the Swamp Thing that he is in actuality Dr. Alec Holland.

title: Dead and Married
description: A recent storm in the swamp uncovers a car wreck from ten years ago,including the married couples ghosts that think only hours have passed.

title: Powers of Darkness
description: A young loner who believes he is a vampire is accused of murdering his mother's boyfriend.

title: Special Request
description: After seemingly having no interest for so many episodes what happened to Jim, Tressa is suddenly in Peru and sidetracked by a voice from her past on a radio.

title: What Goes Around Comes Around
description: Sheriff Andrews allows Dr. Arcane to hunt an employee for sport. To teach Andrews a lesson, Alec traps him a fantasy of the old west populated by familiar faces, forcing him to duel the evil Renegade Jake in a fight to the death.

title: Fear Itself
description: What happens the swamp itself is no longer an ally to Swamp Thing? The answers lay with a man called Mephisto.

title: Changes
description: Arcane has created a poison engineered to specifically target Swamp Thing's genetic code. Ann has discovered a method of temporarily changing Alec back to human form.

title: Destiny
description: Temporally displaced Confederate Civil War soldiers appear in the swamp, one of whom is a previous residence of Will's house. Will helps the man to discover the mystery behind his wartime disappearance and make peace with his past so he can pass on.

title: Tatania
description: Arcane resurrects his wife Tatania only to learn the woman he's kept frozen all these years is Kitty Lane, an exotic dancer and impostor placed in Arcane's lab by General Sunderland. Sunderland has been holding the real Tatania captive.

title: Mirador's Brain
description: Arcane uploads the memory of his former teacher directly into his own. In an ironic twist of justice Carl Mirador was schizophrenic and is now driving Arcane insane.

title: Easy Prey
description: A wealthy hunter stalks and wounds a rare hawk for a trophy. Afterward the swamp takes Will into it's confidence and Will sees the swamp as he never has before.

title: The Handyman
description: The body of a dead man leads Swamp Thing to Arcane and Gen. Sunderland.

title: Hide in the Night
description: When Dr. Arcane "dies" during a mutation experiment gone wrong, Graham accuses Stella of attempting to replace him in the lab by seducing Arcane. During their fight Graham falls for Stella, conceding that Arcane must have seduced her "in mind, if not body." Their tender moment is ruined, however, when Graham is alerted to a break-in at the lab: it's Dr. Arcane, reduced to his inner beast by the failed experiment. Can Graham stop him before tragedy strikes?

title: The Hurting
description: Swamp Thing helps Cathy comprehend her late, alienated mother by showing her visions of her mother's teen-age life.

title: The Specter of Death
description: When one of Dr. Arcane's experiments is inexplicably ruined, Graham suspects poltergeists. Arcane swiftly discovers the spirit of General Sunderland is haunting the swamp, and has plans for revenge.

title: The Chains of Forever
description: Will becomes involved with a couple who hold a map that Arcane has a keene interest in obtaining.

title: An Eye for an Eye
description: When the swamp stalks Arcane in the form of a panther, an ecological message is the overtone about unsafe modes of power encroaching on nature and how she strikes back.

title: Swamp of Dreams
description: Swamp thing finds some "eggs" in the swamp and this makes him start dreaming about when he was human and was in love.

title: Heart of the Mantis
description: When Arcane's mentor Dr. Oliver Duncan is mysteriously killed, everyone assumes Arcane is to blame. Unfazed, Arcane attempts to steal Duncan's cold fusion research by romancing his daughter Louise, who has plans of her own.
